parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Camera Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return camera interest for given entity, as set by [[setCameraInterest]], or as autodetected.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[Number]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''cameraInterest''' entity

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> entity: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code> camInterest = cameraInterest myUnit;
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setCameraInterest]]
</value></part></template>
